display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OWJbBs1X7pAQ7kNvwGdqNEi&_nc_oc=AdlarxFK6QEyJhRDxnMZwJwMiwf-ETpULXd-mTnS_a-hqmKBGJPDbSUl_AYX-3DzHXY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoxFs_5r0zmM3H6_I5nXRgdYu-KTBf5KDEsyYVI9lhimw&oe=6979BC6A)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YD9eMMiWywwQ7kNvwFlYbri&_nc_oc=AdnxJKg-lUMRgqK60it9cHv1Zn8QOEgZA9wj5z4NdVhmVPHo6i_8i9ppKmaJ6McnqwE&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoIDFBhzJaNn-krkk_Xu1LVeyPqDQxsMMFrPK9xTxfqWg&oe=6979ACD2)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ij6Mom55TPUQ7kNvwHlxo1m&_nc_oc=AdnC48W_PwvHkIJcxohoRwHYMMTLTw_ISA4_pfISuIHTvkVZVF9VCEHn1--mmksHlEM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfppKyM9mGhoNR8ay1Da5sr9bdCBiEiLpiguqPjnjJvwMQ&oe=6979B3AD)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p1L4mKX3JfwQ7kNvwHGdQox&_nc_oc=AdlLo0mstmewpULPX7X8NYuzS1D5sFfFSSn_tRg6oY35WrWS2B1yxyUKfMsEwL9eZak&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfojsmlgspP3Ai8Qnd0CGXxNJGoEA_I2cbj3CPR7BqFxtQ&oe=6979C810)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9eTYMdj7dI4Q7kNvwH2NnjD&_nc_oc=AdneGVrT2PRKJRiFnz5hUwKVXl5aXsS4mt9h3Ch9pYLabkCHExHOgYLhHBWNSTffzlc&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqPvCWloUaZIrGTUviGTo78_7Th1QX98jZkq1Qhr7XjHA&oe=6979BC63)
